block_comment: This block of Verilog code is responsible for the initialization of the testbench (tb) simulation environment. It does so by establishing a Value Change Dump (VCD) file named "dsp.vcd", which records all changes in the variables' values throughout the execution of the simulation. The "$dumpvars" function call facilitates trace back by setting up tb at the root hierarchy level (indicated by 0), effectively capturing the entirety of the variable activities within the simulation scope.
